apihelp-query+growthtasks-summary: Get task recommendations suitable for newcomers.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-extended-descr: Suggests a set of articles which have some outstanding issues easy enough for a new editor to tackle.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-param-tasktype: Task types to limit results to. Leave empty to receive all suggestions.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-param-topics: Article topics to prefer in task suggestions.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-param-limit: Maximum number of task suggestions to return.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-param-excludep: Page IDs to exclude from the query.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-param-debug: Add debug data to the output.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-example-1: Get task recommendations for copy-editing-type tasks for the current user.
apihelp-query+growthtasks-example-2: Get task recommendations for the current user, with extended information about the pages.
apihelp-query+growthnextsuggestedtasktyp: Get a suggested task type for a user to try next.
The task type that the user is currently working on.
apihelp-growthexperiments-structured-tas:
A JSON string of an object with these keys:
* <var>acceptedTargets</var>: (optional) Array with the titles of pages, the recommended link to which was accepted by the user.
* <var>rejectedTargets</var>: (optional) Array with the titles of pages, the recommended link to which was rejected by the user.
* <var>skippedTargets</var>: (optional) Array with the titles of pages, the recommended link to which was skipped (ignored) by the user.

A JSON string of an object with these keys:
* <var>accepted</var>: A boolean indicating whether the user accepted the recommended image.
* <var>reasons</var>: An array of strings identifying boolean indicating why the user rejected the recommended image. Valid values: $1
* <var>caption</var>: Image caption provided by the user. (Must have at least $2 {{PLURAL:$2|character|characters}}.)

A JSON string of an object with these keys:
* <var>accepted</var>: A boolean indicating whether the user accepted the recommended image.
* <var>reasons</var>: An array of strings identifying boolean indicating why the user rejected the recommended image. Valid values: $1
* <var>caption</var>: Image caption provided by the user. (Must have at least $2 {{PLURAL:$2|character|characters}}.)
* <var>sectionTitle</var>: Title of the section the suggestion was for.
* <var>sectionNumber</var>: Ordinal number of the article section the suggestion was for.
apihelp-visualeditoredit-paramvalue-plug: Use when saving a GrowthExperiments "[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Structured_tasks/Add_a_link Add a link]" structured edit.
Use when saving a GrowthExperiments "[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Structured_tasks/Add_an_image Add an image]" structured edit.

Use when saving a GrowthExperiments "[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Structured_tasks/Add_an_image#"Add_an_image"_to_a_Section Add an image to a section]" structured edit.
Use when saving a GrowthExperiments "[[mw:Growth/Revise_Tone|Revise Tone]]" structured edit.
apihelp-growthexperiments-structured-tas: No data should be included for this plugin.
apierror-growthexperiments-addimage-hand: 'accepted' parameter missing from Add Image plugin data
'accepted' parameter must be a boolean in Add Image plugin data, is $1
'reasons' parameter missing from Add Image plugin data
'reasons' parameter must be an array in Add Image plugin data, is $1
Invalid item '$1' for 'reasons' parameter, must be one of: $2
'sectionTitle' parameter missing from Add Image plugin data
'sectionTitle' parameter must be null in Add Image plugin data, is $1
'sectionNumber' parameter missing from Add Image plugin data
'sectionNumber' parameter must be null in Add Image plugin data, is $1
apierror-growthexperiments-addsectionima: 'sectionTitle' parameter must be a string in Add Section Image plugin data, is $1
'sectionNumber' parameter must be an integer in Add Section Image plugin data, is $1
growthexperiments-underlinked-rescore-pr: Internal rescore profile used in GrowthExperiments link recommendations for prioritizing articles which do not yet have enough links. This is a no-op when Link Recommendations are disabled.
growthexperiments-addimage-feedback-acce: The <var>editRevId</var> parameter is required when the <var>accepted</var> parameter is set to <kbd>true</kbd>.
growthexperiments-addimage-feedback-reje: The <var>editRevId</var> parameter cannot be used when the <var>accepted</var> parameter is set to <kbd>false</kbd>.
growthexperiments-addimage-feedback-acce: The <var>caption</var> parameter is required when the <var>accepted</var> parameter is set to <kbd>true</kbd>.
growthexperiments-addimage-feedback-revi: The revision specified in <var>editRevId</var> was not found.
growthexperiments-addimage-feedback-inva: The revision specified in <var>editRevId</var> belongs to a different page.
apihelp-growthinvalidaterevisetonerecomm: Drop a 'Revise Tone' recommendation for a given page.
Title of the page for which to drop the recommendation, without namespace.
